amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on the coordination of hunting, fishing, and other recreational activities on military land.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2030 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2030 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270; text: CR S4263) To express the sense of Congress on the coordination of hunting, fishing, and other recreational activities on military land.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2030 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2030 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
